mapper.select: SELECT plan_no AS planNo, plan_public AS planPublic, plan_writer AS planWriter, plan_title AS planTitle, TO_CHAR(plan_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS planStart, TO_CHAR(plan_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS planEnd, plan_content AS planContent, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM share_plan sp1 WHERE sp1.share_plan=p.plan_no) AS planShare, plan_view AS planView, plan_thumbnail_no AS planThumbnailNo FROM plan WHERE plan_writer = #{id}

SELECT p.plan_no AS planNo, p.plan_public AS planPublic, p.plan_title AS planTitle, TO_CHAR(p.plan_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS planStart, TO_CHAR(p.plan_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS planEnd, p.plan_content AS planContent, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM share_plan sp WHERE sp.share_plan_member = #{planMember} AND sp.share_plan=p.plan_no), 1, 1, 0) AS shareCheck, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM share_plan sp2 WHERE sp2.share_plan=p.plan_no) AS planShare, p.plan_view AS planView, p.plan_thumbnail_no AS planThumbnailNo, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_plan lp WHERE lp.like_plan_member = #{planMember} AND lp.like_plan=p.plan_no), 1, 1, 0) AS likeCheck, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_plan lp2 WHERE lp2.like_plan=p.plan_no) AS planLike FROM (SELECT * FROM plan ORDER BY (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_plan WHERE like_plan=plan_no) DESC)p WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT p.plan_no AS planNo, p.plan_public AS planPublic, p.plan_title AS planTitle, TO_CHAR(p.plan_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS planStart, TO_CHAR(p.plan_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS planEnd, p.plan_content AS planContent, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM share_plan sp WHERE sp.share_plan_member = #{planMember} AND sp.share_plan=p.plan_no), 1, 1, 0) AS shareCheck, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM share_plan sp2 WHERE sp2.share_plan=p.plan_no) AS planShare, p.plan_view AS planView, p.plan_thumbnail_no AS planThumbnailNo, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_plan lp WHERE lp.like_plan_member = #{planMember} AND lp.like_plan=p.plan_no), 1, 1, 0) AS likeCheck, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_plan lp2 WHERE lp2.like_plan=p.plan_no) AS planLike FROM (SELECT * FROM plan ORDER BY plan_start DESC)p WHERE ROWNUM <= #{planKind} AND plan_start >= SYSDATE -1

SELECT p.plan_no AS planNo, p.plan_public AS planPublic, p.plan_title AS planTitle, TO_CHAR(p.plan_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS planStart, TO_CHAR(p.plan_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS planEnd, p.plan_content AS planContent, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM share_plan sp WHERE sp.share_plan_member = #{planMember} AND sp.share_plan=p.plan_no), 1, 1, 0) AS shareCheck, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM share_plan sp2 WHERE sp2.share_plan=p.plan_no) AS planShare, p.plan_view AS planView, p.plan_thumbnail_no AS planThumbnailNo, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_plan lp WHERE lp.like_plan_member = #{planMember} AND lp.like_plan=p.plan_no), 1, 1, 0) AS likeCheck, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_plan lp2 WHERE lp2.like_plan=p.plan_no) AS planLike FROM (SELECT * FROM plan ORDER BY plan_view DESC)p WHERE ROWNUM <= #{planKind}

SELECT p.plan_no AS planNo, p.plan_public AS planPublic, p.plan_title AS planTitle, TO_CHAR(p.plan_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS planStart, TO_CHAR(p.plan_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS planEnd, p.plan_content AS planContent, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM share_plan sp2 WHERE sp2.share_plan=p.plan_no) AS planShare, p.plan_view AS planView, p.plan_thumbnail_no AS planThumbnailNo, (p.plan_end-p.plan_start) AS planDay FROM plan p WHERE p.plan_no = #{planNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE plan SET plan_view = plan_view+1 WHERE plan_no = #{planNo}
